summary: This release adds exciting new domain discovery features including live updates on domain availability and TLD diversity preferences, making it easier to find your perfect blog name. We've also enhanced the quiz experience with follow-up questions and improved reliability across the platform. Plus, we've fixed several bugs to ensure everything runs smoothly for your blogging journey.

features: add token tracking to domain search jobs
Add follow-up quiz to history detail page
add TLD diversity UI and live history updates
sync tokens, duration, results from worker
add auto-tag workflow on version bump
fixes: allow relative URLs in sanitizeMarkdown and sanitizeHTML
improve date display and update TODOs
fix elapsed timer and TLD preferences display
add NODE_AUTH_TOKEN env for npm publish
add workflow_dispatch and fix checkout ref for npm publish
fix sync schema mismatch for domains_available column
